title: Multi-Modal Brain Tumor Segmentation via 3D Multi-Scale Self-attention and Cross-attention
details: Y Huang, L Chen, C Zhou - arXiv preprint arXiv:2504.09088, 2025
abstract: Due to the success of CNN-based and Transformer-based models in various computer vision tasks, recent works study the applicability of CNN-Transformer hybrid architecture models in 3D multi-modality medical segmentation tasks …
